statements: DELETE FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE location_name = 'Garden' AND nutrient_type = 'Nitrogen';
DELETE FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE sample_id = 10 AND soil_ph < 6.5;
DELETE FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE location_name = 'Farm A' AND nutrient_level > 3.0;
DELETE FROM SoilCompositionData WHERE soil_id = 123 AND location = 'Garden A';
DELETE FROM SoilHealthAnalysis WHERE health_rating > 7.5 AND analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SoilHealth WHERE sample_id = 1001 AND health_rating > 80;
DELETE FROM NutrientLevels WHERE value < 2.5 OR nutrient_name = 'Phosphorus';
DELETE FROM nutrient_analysis WHERE nitrate > 5 AND phosphate < 2;
